name: Raise A Hotdog (V1.2.1)
description:
"It's like a clicker game, but not!" -Me when making up a fake review of the game

In Raise A Hotdog you, well, raise a Hotdog. Buy him friend (Because money can buy that), food and devices that you'll strap to him and exploit for money!

Very fun gameplay because yes

=====================================================

UPDATE LOG

V1.0.1

- Added mobile support (Toggle in bottom-right, disappears after activation or 5 seconds)

V1.0.2

- Cost changes

   - Food 50 > 100

   - Bandana 50 > 100

   - Bed 150 > 250

   - Zane 350 > 500

   - Hotdog Helper 550 > 800

   - Cooler Setup 750 > 550

   - Jar 1500 > 2000

- Item Revamps

   - Autoclicker click speed 1s > 2s

   - Autoclicker V2 click speed 0.5s > 1s

   - Autoclicker V3 click speed 0.1s > 0.5s

   - Autoclicker V4 click speed 0.05s > 0.1s

   - Roommate starting rent 2 > 4

- Description updates

 -Autoclicker V2: "Autoclicker but 2x faster"

 -Autoclicker V3: "Autoclicker V2 but 2x faster"

 -Autoclicker V4: "Autoclicker V3 but 5x faster"

- Misc.

   - Added Z/X keys for mobile, now they can actually play the game

V1.1.0

- Cost changes

   - Autoclicker V4 100000 > 200000

- Description changes

   -Autoclicker: "Automatic clicker. It's not rocket science"

    -Autoclicker V2: "Autoclicker but it's down'd a glass of Red Bull"

    -Autoclicker V3: "Minecraft Pre-1.8 PvP CPS be like:"

    -Autoclicker V4: "Ok this is getting ridiculous"

- Item removals

   - Super feeder removed (Replaced with Outside Permit)

- New items

   -Outside permit

      - Allows access to outside where you can grow a farm for money

- Farm house items

   - Potato (2000): Plants a potato that grows after 2 days, giving money when grown

   - Fisherman (20000) Every 30-45 seconds, generates some money:

      - 49% Chance for 3000

      - 25% Chance for 4000

      - 25% Chance for 1000

      - 1% Chance for permanent 2x money from Hotdog (Every subsequent time you get this is 15000)

   - Better Fertiliser (30000) Reduces potato grow time to 1 day

   - Farmer (40000) Auto-collects potatoes and increases potato profits

   - Bigger Fish (40000) Chance for fisherman to generate a lot of money in 1 catch

   - Super farmer (50000) Auto-plants potatoes for free and increases potato profits even more

V1.1.1

-Misc.

   - Fixed literally everything about the potato farm/farmers

   - Added sounds for the farmer and fisherman when performing an action

V1.2.0

- New items

   - Basement Door (Replaces Autoclicker V4)

      - Costs 100000, opens the basement and access to the Black Market

- Black Market items

   - Autoclicker V4 (200000) Same as in previous updates

   - Hacker (300000) Gives 3x money

   - Roommate V3 (400000) Roommate rent quadruples each day and with no limit

   - Illegal Fishing Techniques (400000) Fisherman has double chance to reel in a heap of money

   - Improved Hacks (500000) Increases hacker bonus from 3x to 5x

   - Broken Autoclicker (1000000) [REDACTED]

- Balance changes

   - Potato Farm grow chances are altered

      - 3000 money 49% > 50%

      - 1000 money 25% > 20%

      - 5000 money 25% > 20%

      - 2x money 1% > 10%

V1.2.1

- Bug Fixes

   - Fixed bug where mobile controls won't buy/will buy the wrong item in the shop

   - Fixed 'Cooler Setup' not purchasing

- Misc.

   - Mobile buttons now show by default
